Articles.Content:
After seeing how much Dres is ignored in the KSP community, I thought that I would make a challenge to do with Dres. So I present the creatively named Dres Challenge!

The goal is to send as many ships to Dres as possible, and make a good-looking ground base/station there, and maybe even explore the asteroids, just do anything Dres! I'm counting points on how cool the ship/base/station looks and how functional it is, try explore the biomes of the space potato and have fun!

Sorry, no badge here

Rules: No Debug Menu, any mods can be used except Hyperedit or any cheaty add-ons, Mechjeb is allowed if you really cant be bothered to do something, give us some proof if you collected some cool science there.

Edited July 24, 2015 by Sharkman Briton

Can you give us more rules, mod restrictions, and debug menu. Config edits? Rethink the challenge and give us rules. Read this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide
Yea, I agree with Kaboom! This is just a tad too open-ended.

Yea, I agree with Kaboom! This is just a tad too open-ended.

I kind of want to have it be open for choice and not restricted to "make station with littlest funds possible for collecting science"

I have sufficient love for Dres

It's a great launching point to Jool, low enough gravity to escape easily enough and to mine with ease. The ships refuel there and are sent on their way soon after. And the canyon is cool. Low enough priority to everyone else that attacks are relatively uncommon

And the asteroids pushed it to third on my list. Just below Lathe and Minmus.

Edited July 26, 2015 by Spartwo

It's a great launching point to Jool, low enough gravity to escape easily enough and to mine with ease. The ships refuel there and are sent on their way soon after. And the canyon is cool. Low enough priority to everyone else that attacks are relatively uncommon

Amazing! That mothership is the stuff of Sci-Fi!
